documents.document: "Following consultation with clubs, it was agreed matches would not be open to away supporters due to varying operational challenges across the League and the need to deliver a consistent approach, while maximising the opportunity for home-fan attendance"
Premier League confirm the final two rounds of matches this season will be limited to home fans. Was hope that 500 away fans could be allowed but PL have, this morning, said only home fans permitted
Ancelotti on Josh King: "In the last few weeks he had a small problem on his back. He was back today after two days off."
Ancelotti on possible James contract extension: "We didn't talk about the extension. I am not involved in this. His contract is quite clear."
Ancelotti on investing: "We didn't talk for the next season but we are going to talk in the next few weeks to try and improve the squad. Until now we have improved a lot compared to last season."
Everton have fully fit squad apart from Doucoure and Gbamin

Ancelotti on immediate reaction to Super League plans: "They are joking. This is a joke."
Ancelotti; "The way we are working now is the right way. We have improved the team, we improved the knowledge of the players. We have to improve other things to play the Super Leag...oh sorry!"
RT @Adam_Jones94: On Brands: "It's a good sign for the stability of the club. We are in the right way and I hope that we can grow quickly h
"I think the way they proposed the Super League, is impossible. But in 2024 there will be a new format of the Champions League and there we can have a discussion..."

Ancelotti on punishment for six clubs: "I am not the right person to judge and say if they have to be punished. There are rules that have to be respected. Everyone can make mistakes but I cannot say if they have to be punished or not."
"They were wrong. Full stop. They are back now. Everyone of us wants the Champions League more competitive. "
"The most important part, they wanted to build up a competition without sporting merit,"

Ancelotti on the European Super League: "For every supporter of football it was a strange day, a surprise. We heard about the Super League in the past few moths but I was sure it was not going to happen. What can I say? They were wrong."
Ancelotti confirms DCL, Mina, Gomes, Delph and Bernard are all fit

Ancelotti: "I think we are ready [for the run-in]. It is true we didn't have a good moment in the last month but we are much better and have more players available. We are ready to fight for this final part of the season."
